card.name: Scale of Gold and Binding
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Draw 2 cards. :► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block.

card.name: Faywon, Green Knowledge Silver
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures.

card.name: Just Labyrinth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ You may tap any number of your creatures. ■ Draw a card for each of your tapped creatures.

card.name: Rudolgo, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

card.name: Levoix, Blue Defense Silver
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your creatures. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creature's attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures.

card.name: Harplara, Play Music
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 2 or less other creatures in the battle zone, this creature can't untap. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon

card.name: Okario, Play Music
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon

card.name: Donato, Boundary Will
card.text: ■ More than 2 of this card in your Super Gacharange ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Elgre, Controlling Will
card.text: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Shinpas, Calming Judgment Bond/Justice Shaper
card.text: ■ Sympathy Creature ■ Neo Evolution ■ Double Breaker ========================= ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Shantan, Play Music
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your other light creatures. If you do, gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon
